item.title: C3S API
item.description: C3S API v3.1.0 Scroll down for code samples, example requests and responses. Select a language for code samples from the tabs above or the mobile navigation menu. An API for creating, running and analysing citizen science projects Base URLs: https://staging.citizenscience.ch/v3 https://api.citizenscience.ch/v3 Authentication API Key (anonUser) Parameter Name: X-ANON, in: header. API Key (apiKeyHeader) Parameter Name: X-API-KEY, in: header. oAuth2 authentication.
